title: 新约 - 马太福音(Matthew) - 第 25 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 马太福音(Matthew) -- 第 25 章 ( 本篇共有 28 章 )

lineList.en: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.
lineList.cn: 那时，天国好比十个童女，拿着灯，出去迎接新郎。

lineList.en: And five of them were wise, and five were foolish.
lineList.cn: 其中有五个是愚拙的。五个是聪明的。

lineList.en: They that were foolish took their lamps, and took no oil with them:
lineList.cn: 愚拙的拿着灯，却不豫备油。

lineList.en: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps.
lineList.cn: 聪明的拿着灯，又豫备油在器皿里。

lineList.en: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.
lineList.cn: 新郎迟延的时候，他们都打盹睡着了。

lineList.en: And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him.
lineList.cn: 半夜有人喊着说，新郎来了，你们出来迎接他。

lineList.en: Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.
lineList.cn: 那些童女就都起来收拾灯。

lineList.en: And the foolish said unto the wise, Give us of your oil; for our lamps are gone out.
lineList.cn: 愚拙的对聪明的说，请分点油给我们。因为我们的灯要灭了。

lineList.en: But the wise answered, saying, Not so; lest there be not enough for us and you: but go ye rather to them that sell, and buy for yourselves.
lineList.cn: 聪明的回答说，恐怕不够你我用的。不如你们自己到卖油的那里去买吧。

lineList.en: And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.
lineList.cn: 他们去买的时候，新郎到了。那豫备好了的，同他进去坐席。门就关了。

lineList.en: Afterward came also the other virgins, saying, Lord, Lord, open to us.
lineList.cn: 其馀的童女，随后也来了，说，主阿，主阿，给我们开门。

lineList.en: But he answered and said, Verily I say unto you, I know you not.
lineList.cn: 他却回答说，我实在告诉你们，我不认识你们。

lineList.en: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
lineList.cn: 所以你们要儆醒，因为那日子，那时辰，你们不知道。

lineList.en: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.
lineList.cn: 天国又好比一个人要往外国去，就叫了仆人来，把他的家业交给他们。

lineList.en: And unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.
lineList.cn: 按着各人的才干，给他们银子。一个给了五千，一个给了二千，一个给了一千。就往外国去了。

lineList.en: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made them other five talents.
lineList.cn: 那领五千的，随既拿去做买卖，另外赚了五千。

lineList.en: And likewise he that had received two, he also gained other two.
lineList.cn: 那领二千的，也照样另赚了二千。

lineList.en: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
lineList.cn: 但那领一千的，去掘开地，把主人的银子埋藏了。

lineList.en: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.
lineList.cn: 过了许久，那些仆人的主人来了，和他们算账。

lineList.en: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.
lineList.cn: 那领五千银子的，又带着那另外的五千来，说，主阿，你交给我五千银子，请看，我又赚了五千。

lineList.en: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
lineList.cn: 主人说，好，你这又良善又忠心的仆人。你在不多的事上有忠心，我把许多事派你管理。可以进来享受你主人的快乐。

lineList.en: He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.
lineList.cn: 那领二千的也来说，主阿，你交给我二千银子，请看，我又赚了二千。

lineList.en: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
lineList.cn: 主人说，好，你这又良善又忠心的仆人。你在不多的事上有忠心，我把许多事派你管理。可以进来享受你主人的快乐。

lineList.en: Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:
lineList.cn: 那领一千的，也来说，主阿，我知道你是忍心的人，没有种的地方要收割，没有散的地方要聚敛。

lineList.en: And I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, there thou hast that is thine.
lineList.cn: 我就害怕，去把你的一千银子埋藏在地里。请看，你的原银在这里。

lineList.en: His lord answered and said unto him, Thou wicked and slothful servant, thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not, and gather where I have not strawed:
lineList.cn: 主人回答说，你这又恶又懒的仆人，你既知道我没有种的地方要收割，没有散的地方要聚敛。

lineList.en: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
lineList.cn: 就当把我的银子放给兑换银钱的人，到我来的时候，可以连本带利收回。

lineList.en: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.
lineList.cn: 夺过他这一千来，给那有一万的。

lineList.en: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.
lineList.cn: 因为凡有的，还要加给他，叫他有馀。没有的，连他所有的，也要夺过来。

lineList.en: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
lineList.cn: 把这无用的仆人，丢在外面黑暗里。在那里必要哀哭切齿了。

lineList.en: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:
lineList.cn: 当人子在他荣耀里同着众天使降临的时候，要坐在他荣耀的宝座上。

lineList.en: And before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:
lineList.cn: 万民都要聚集在他面前。他要把他们分别出来，好像牧羊的分别绵羊山羊一般。

lineList.en: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.
lineList.cn: 把绵羊安置在右边，山羊在左边。

lineList.en: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:
lineList.cn: 于是王要向那右边的说，你们这蒙我父赐福的，可来承受那创世以来为你们所预备的国。

lineList.en: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in:
lineList.cn: 因为我饿了，你们给我吃。渴了，你们给我喝。我作客旅，你们留我住。

lineList.en: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.
lineList.cn: 我赤身露体，你们给我穿。我病了，你们看顾我。我在监里，你们来看我。

lineList.en: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink?
lineList.cn: 义人就回答说，主阿，我们什么时候见你饿了给你吃，渴了给你喝。

lineList.en: When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee?
lineList.cn: 什么时候见你作客旅留你住，或是赤身露体给你穿。

lineList.en: Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee?
lineList.cn: 又什么时候见你病了，或是在监里，来看你呢。

lineList.en: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
lineList.cn: 王要回答说，我实在告诉你们，这些事你们既作在我这弟兄中一个最小的身上，就是作在我身上了。

lineList.en: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:
lineList.cn: 王又要向那左边的说，你们这被咒诅的人，离开我，进入那为魔鬼和他的使者所豫备的永火里去。

lineList.en: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:
lineList.cn: 因为我饿了，你们不给我吃。渴了，你们不给我喝。

lineList.en: I was a stranger, and ye took me not in: naked, and ye clothed me not: sick, and in prison, and ye visited me not.
lineList.cn: 我作客旅，你们不留我住。我赤身露体，你们不给我穿。我病了，我在监里，你们不来看顾我。

lineList.en: Then shall they also answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, or athirst, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and did not minister unto thee?
lineList.cn: 他们也要回答说，主阿，我们什么时候见你饿了，或渴了，或作客旅，或赤身露体，或病了，或在监里，不伺候你呢。

lineList.en: Then shall he answer them, saying, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these, ye did it not to me.
lineList.cn: 王要回答说，我实在告诉你们，这些事你们既不作在我这弟兄中一个最小的身上，就是不作在我身上了。

lineList.en: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.
lineList.cn: 这些人要往永刑里去。那些义人要往永生里去。
